ModMetaData.name: Corvus Surgery UI
ModMetaData.author: PlatoArete
ModMetaData.description:
Enhanced surgery planning interface that works with all surgery mods.
Features: - Comprehensive surgery browser with filtering and search - Shows availability, requirements, and mod sources - Compatible with all surgery mods (EPOE, Rah's Bionics, etc.) - Performance optimized for large mod lists - Integrates seamlessly with existing medical bills system
LOAD ORDER: Place this mod AFTER all surgery/medical mods for best compatibility.
Compatible with all RimWorld versions and surgery mods.
